abstract: Liviu Ciulei, who was voted best director at the Cannes Film Festival in 1965 and who led the Guthrie Theater in Minneapolis in the 1980s, dies at age 88.
snippet: The Romanian-born Mr. Ciulei was best known in the United States for leading the Guthrie Theater in Minneapolis and for productions at Arena Stage in Washington.
lead_paragraph: The Romanian-born Mr. Ciulei was best known in the United States for leading the Guthrie Theater in Minneapolis and for productions at Arena Stage in Washington.

headline.main: Liviu Ciulei, a Daring Theater Director, Dies at 88
headline.print_headline: Liviu Ciulei, a Daring Theater Director, Dies at 88
headline.seo: Liviu Ciulei, a Daring Theater Director, Dies at 88
